bibl.title: Manuscripts at Oxford: an exhibition in memory of Richard William Hunt.
bibl.note: 21 papyri illustrating the earlier history of Latin pen-writing.
bibl.seg: A.C. De la Mare and B.C. Barker-Benfield (Edd.), Manuscripts at Oxford: an exhibition in memory of Richard William Hunt. (Oxford, Bodleian Library, 1980), in fol., pp. 2-8, figg. 3-4.
